sub_topic: Determining the length of a side in an equilateral triangle.
message_1: An equilateral triangle has a perimeter of 30 cm. What is the length of each side of the triangle?
message_2:
An equilateral triangle has three equal sides. To find the length of each side, we can divide the perimeter by the number of sides.

Perimeter = 30 cm
Number of sides = 3

Length of each side = Perimeter / Number of sides = 30 cm / 3 = 10 cm

Each side of the equilateral triangle is 10 cm long.
